snippet.title: Lost Eidolons | Official Release Date Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
It's official. Lost Eidolons will be available on October 13th on your PC.
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/3mHDs7i 

You are Eden, a lowly mercenary forced to become a rebel commander when your village is thrust into war. Finding yourself as the enemy of the empire is one thing, but having to cross swords with men you once called friends is quite another.
Recruit and rally your troops amidst the growing politics and splintering alliances. Only your leadership and the strength of your army will end the war in this turn-based tactical RPG.

Want regular updates about the game and talk with the people working to make it happen?
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/OceanDriveGames
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OceanDriveGames/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oceandrivegames/
- Discord: https://discord.gg/sNAqA9eHnK

#turnbased #rpg #medieval #tactical #strategy
